dict.string: Claude Code Controller needs Bluetooth access to connect to your PS5 DualSense controller for navigation and command input.
Claude Code Controller uses Bluetooth to communicate with your PS5 DualSense controller.
Claude Code Controller uses speech recognition to convert your voice commands into text input when you press the Options button on your controller.
Claude Code Controller needs microphone access to enable voice-to-text functionality when using the Options button on your controller.
